tools.name: extract_timestamps
tools.description: Extract creation, modification, and publication timestamps from a webpage

url.description: The URL of the webpage to extract timestamps from

userAgent.description: User agent string to use for requests

followRedirects.description: Whether to follow HTTP redirects (default: true)

maxRedirects.description: Maximum number of redirects to follow (default: 5)

enableHeuristics.description: Whether to enable heuristic timestamp detection (default: true)

tools.name: batch_extract_timestamps
tools.description: Extract timestamps from multiple webpages in batch

urls.description: Array of URLs to extract timestamps from

userAgent.description: User agent string to use for requests

followRedirects.description: Whether to follow HTTP redirects (default: true)

maxRedirects.description: Maximum number of redirects to follow (default: 5)

enableHeuristics.description: Whether to enable heuristic timestamp detection (default: true)
